description: Comprehensive Question-to-REC code mappings for complete R2v3 standard coverage

mappings.rationale: Scope definition and certification status - fundamental to R2v3 compliance
Equipment types and materials scope documentation
Sales websites linked to certified operations
Written hierarchy policy - reuse over recycling
Items directed to reuse when capable
Disposal only when no recycling options
Hierarchy policy covering on-site and off-site
Regulatory violations reported to CB within 30 days
Chain of custody for data-bearing devices
Environmental compliance - violations and corrective actions
Quality control and verification - inspection procedures
Worker safety and training - safety programs
NIST 800-88 data destruction procedures - core data security requirement
Environmental management systems for all processing activities
Processing area segregation for facility structure and sorting procedures
Legal authorization to operate as electronics recycler
Transportation and storage procedures for all materials

notes: Comprehensive R2v3 standard coverage with 48 distinct REC codes mapping all 405 questions. Each Core Requirement (CR1-CR10) and Appendix (A-G) has dedicated REC codes. Additional categories for audit, compliance, quality control, risk management, certification maintenance, and worker safety are also covered.
